item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，边疆航空公司和精神航空公司重启合并谈判
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）正在探索重新竞购精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）。【原文：Frontier Airlines is exploring a renewed bid for Spirit Airlines , the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 东京地铁公司股票首次上市未交易
item.description: 东京地铁公司的股票周三在东京市场首次上市，但早盘交易中买单过多，导致该公司股票无人交易。【原文：Tokyo Metro saw its stock untraded on its Tokyo market debut on Wednesday with a glut of buy orders in early trade.】

item.title: 特朗普表示，如果是国产汽车，汽车贷款利息可抵税
item.description: 共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，如果汽车是在美国国内制造的，他将规定汽车贷款利息可全额减税。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Tuesday he will make interest on car loans fully tax deductible if the car is domestically built in the United States.】

item.title: 巴西家乐福以 1.27 亿美元的价格出售阿塔卡岛 15 家分店
item.description: 食品零售商家乐福（Carrefour Brasil）周二表示，已同意以 7.25 亿雷亚尔（1.274 亿美元）的价格向一家房地产基金出售 15 处房产。【原文：Food retailer Carrefour Brasil has agreed to sell 15 properties to a real estate fund for 725 million reais ($127.4 million), it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高盛认为供应充足，2025 年油价将维持在 76 美元/桶左右
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周二在一份报告中称，基于原油适度过剩和主要产油国的剩余产能，以及对伊朗供应可能中断的担忧有所缓解，预计 2025 年油价平均为每桶 76 美元。【原文：Goldman Sachs expects oil prices to average $76 a barrel in 2025 based on a moderate crude surplus and spare capacity among major producers, with concerns easing over a potential disruption in Iranian supply, it said in a note on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国银行业对 "开放银行 "新规提出法律挑战
item.description: 周二，一对美国银行业贸易团体提起诉讼，质疑消费者金融保护局发布的新规定，该规定将使消费者更容易在金融服务提供商之间进行转换。【原文：A pair of U.S. banking trade groups filed a lawsuit on Tuesday challenging new rules issued by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau that would make it easier for consumers to switch between financial services providers.】

item.title: 早间竞价美国收益率飙升吓坏投资者
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Corvex 创始人迈斯特认为已被其他公司盯上的股票有很大的上升空间
item.description: 激进投资者基思-迈斯特（Keith Meister）并没有因为落后于其他企业煽动者而感到尴尬，他表示，对手的工作促使他买入了 Illumina、Dollar Tree 和 Fortrea 等公司，他认为这些公司的股票将大涨。【原文：Activist investor Keith Meister is not embarrassed about lagging behind other corporate agitators, saying his rivals' work has led him to buy companies such as Illumina , Dollar Tree and Fortrea where he argues the stocks are due for big gains.】

item.title: 澳大利亚就定价折扣问题将昆士保险公司告上法庭
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构周三表示，将把昆士兰保险公司告上法庭，指控该公司在某些普通保险产品的折扣价值方面误导客户。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Wednesday it is taking insurance firm QBE to court, alleging that the company misled customers around the value of discounts offered on certain general insurance products.】

item.title: 贝克休斯季度利润超预期，得益于国际钻井需求
item.description: 美国油田技术公司贝克休斯周二公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于国际市场对其钻井设备和技术的持续需求。【原文：U.S. oilfield technology firm Baker Hughes beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by sustained demand for its drilling equipment and technology in international markets.】

item.title: Eletrobras 和 Ocean Winds 同意评估巴西的海上风电项目
item.description: 巴西电力公司 Eletrobras 周二在一份联合声明中表示，该公司已与 Ocean Winds 签署了一份谅解备忘录，研究在巴西开发海上风电场。【原文：Brazilian power firm Eletrobras has signed a memorandum of understanding with Ocean Winds to study the development of offshore wind farms in Brazil, the firms said on Tuesday in a joint statement.】

item.title: 美国疾病预防控制中心称，麦当劳四分一磅三明治引发大肠杆菌感染，十人住院，一人死亡
item.description: 美国疾病控制中心（U.S. Centers for Disease Control）周二表示，在美国 10 个州发生的与麦当劳 Quarter Pounder 汉堡包有关的大肠杆菌感染事件已导致 10 人住院治疗，科罗拉多州的一名老人死亡。【原文：Ten people have been hospitalized and one older person in Colorado has died after E. coli infections linked to McDonald's Quarter Pounder hamburger in 10 states, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 世界银行将向阿根廷提供超过 20 亿美元的社会援助贷款
item.description: 世界银行地区副总裁周二表示，世界银行准备向阿根廷提供 20 多亿美元的新贷款，用于社会保障、教育、交通、能源和消除贫困。【原文：The World Bank is prepared to provide Argentina with more than $2 billion in new loans destined for social security, education, transport, energy and battling poverty, the multilateral lender's regional vice president said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Meta Platforms 打败股东对儿童安全索赔的诉讼
item.description: Meta Platforms 和首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）赢得了一项诉讼的驳回，该诉讼称他们在 Meta 的代理声明中误导了股东，误导股东他们有能力确保使用 Facebook 和 Instagram 的儿童的安全。【原文：Meta Platforms and Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg won the dismissal of a lawsuit claiming they misled shareholders in Meta's proxy statement about their ability to ensure the safety of children who use Facebook and Instagram.】

item.title: 新任首席执行官领导下的星巴克扭亏为盈，星巴克下调年度业绩预期
item.description: 星巴克公司（Starbucks Corp）周二表示，由于新任首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）希望扭转这家咖啡巨头因顾客需求减少而陷入困境的局面，公司将暂停发布年度预测。【原文：Starbucks Corp said on Tuesday it was suspending its annual forecasts as new CEO Brian Niccol looks to turn around the coffee giant struggling to stem easing customer demand.】

item.title: 工业市场芯片需求疲软，德州仪器预测第四季度业绩低于预期
item.description: 本周二，德州仪器公司（Texas Instruments）预测第四季度营收和利润将低于分析师预期，因为这家模拟芯片制造商正在应对汽车和工业等市场的积压订单，这些订单迫使客户暂缓下单。【原文：Texas Instruments forecast fourth-quarter revenue and profit below analysts' estimates on Tuesday as the analog chipmaker navigates a buildup in markets such as automotive and industrial that has forced customers to hold back on orders.】

item.title: 美国证交会以 180 万美元与做空者安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）的合伙人达成和解
item.description: 法庭文件显示，美国做空机构香橼研究公司（Citron Research）的安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）的同事瑞安-崔（Ryan Choi）同意支付 180 万美元，以了结美国证券交易委员会（SEC）对香橼公司两笔股票推荐的指控。【原文：Ryan Choi, an associate of U.S. short seller Andrew Left of Citron Research, agreed to pay $1.8 million to settle U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) charges relating to two of Citron's stock recommendations, according to court documents.】

item.title: 沃尔玛支付 750 万美元解决加州危险废物指控
item.description: 沃尔玛已同意支付 750 万美元，以解决对这家美国最大零售商在加利福尼亚州城市垃圾填埋场非法处置其设施中的危险废物和医疗废物的民事指控。【原文：Walmart has agreed to pay $7.5 million to resolve civil charges that the largest U.S. retailer illegally disposed hazardous waste and medical waste from its facilities in California municipal landfills.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，东京交易所员工因涉嫌内幕交易而受到调查
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周三援引消息人士的话报道，东京证券交易所的一名员工因涉嫌内幕交易，目前正在接受该国金融监管机构的调查。【原文：A Tokyo Stock Exchange employee is currently under investigation by the country's financial watchdog for suspected insider trading, the Nikkei reported on Wednesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 高通公司与 Alphabet 合作开发汽车人工智能；梅赛德斯签订芯片协议
item.description: 高通公司（Qualcomm）周二表示，它将与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）合作，提供芯片和软件组合，让汽车制造商可以利用两家公司的技术开发自己的人工智能语音助手。【原文：Qualcomm on Tuesday said it was teaming up with Alphabet's Google to offer a combination of chips and software that will let automakers develop their own AI voice assistants using technology from the two firms.】

item.title: OpenAI 聘请前白宫官员担任首席经济学家
item.description: ChatGPT 的母公司 OpenAI 已聘请前白宫官员亚伦-查特吉（Aaron Chatterji）担任其首位首席经济学家，负责研究人工智能对经济的影响。【原文：ChatGPT parent OpenAI has tapped former White House official Aaron Chatterji as its first chief economist to lead research on AI's impact on the economy, the startup at the center of the generative artificial intelligence frenzy said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国为天然气管道现代化拨款 1.96 亿美元
item.description: 美国运输部管道与危险材料安全管理局（Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration）周二宣布，美国政府将拨款 1.96 亿美元，用于维修和更换 20 个州的老化天然气管道。【原文：The U.S. government will award grants totaling $196 million for the repair and replacement of aging natural gas pipelines across 20 states, the Department of Transportation's Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration has announced on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，申银万国上半年营收增长放缓，原因是有上市计划
item.description: The Information 周二援引两位知情人士的话报道称，在线零售商 Shein 今年上半年的收入增长从去年的 40% 放缓至 23%，该公司正在为备受期待的伦敦上市做准备。【原文：Online retailer Shein's revenue growth slowed to 23% in the first half of this year, from 40% last year, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing two people familiar with the matter, as it prepares for a highly anticipated listing in London.】

item.title: 矿业巨头墨西哥集团第三季度净利润增长 18
item.description: 受铜价上涨和生产水平提高的推动，矿业和运输集团墨西哥集团周二报告称，第三季度净利润增长了 17.55%。【原文：Mining and transport conglomerate Grupo Mexico on Tuesday reported a 17.55% increase in its net profit during the third quarter, boosted by copper prices and higher production levels.】

item.title: 美国将半导体税收减免政策扩展至部分太阳能工厂
item.description: 拜登政府周二表示，将把半导体制造业税收减免政策的适用范围扩大到太阳能晶片生产商，这些晶片是用于制造太阳能电池板的薄硅片，主要在中国生产。【原文：The Biden administration said on Tuesday it would extend a semiconductor manufacturing tax break to producers of solar wafers, thin silicon slices used to make solar panels that are primarily produced in China.】

item.title: 越来越多的美国公司依靠退休的资深领导人在波涛汹涌的经济中稳住航向
item.description: CVS Health 上周任命了一位久经考验的公司资深人士担任首席执行官，这是今年少数几家转向由经验丰富的高管掌舵的公司中的最新一家，这些公司希望在经济不确定的情况下平息投资者的担忧。【原文：CVS Health last week named as CEO a tried-and-tested company veteran, the latest in a handful of firms this year that have turned to an experienced executive to take the helm, hoping to quell investor concerns amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：高盛因信用卡业务面临美国 CFPB 罚款
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，高盛正面临美国消费者金融保护局对其信用卡业务处以数千万美元的罚款。【原文：Goldman Sachs is facing a fine in the tens of millions of dollars from the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau over its credit card business, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空公司在投资者日活动中上调盈利展望
item.description: 本周二，拉塔姆航空公司将其 2024 年 EBITDAR（未计利息、税项、折旧及摊销和租金成本前的利润）的指导目标上调至 30 亿至 31.5 亿美元之间。【原文：Latam Airlines revised its guidance for 2024 EBITDAR, or earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization and rent costs, upward on Tuesday to between $3.0 and $3.15 billion.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体公司股价飙升，博彩赔率看好白宫获胜
item.description: 本周二，美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普的媒体公司股价飙升至 7 月份以来的最高点，因为博彩赔率看好这位共和党候选人竞选白宫连任。【原文：Shares of former U.S. President Donald Trump's media company surged to their highest since July on Tuesday as betting odds favored the Republican candidate in his bid for reelection to the White House.】

item.title: 花旗集团晋升三位银行家推动医疗并购
item.description: 路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录显示，花旗集团已经提拔了三位资深医疗保健投资银行家--Sumit Khedekar、Nishant Jadav 和 Michael Guarino，以推动该行在该行业赢得更多交易。【原文：Citigroup has promoted three senior healthcare investment bankers - Sumit Khedekar, Nishant Jadav and Michael Guarino - in the bank's push to win more deals in the industry, an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday showed.】
